metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37768 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: libjpeg commit 281daa9 was discovered to contain an infinite loop via thecomponent Frame::ParseTrailer.

criterions.comment: libjpeg6b: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libjpeg-turbo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libjpeg9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
